alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 2:36PM MST until December 23 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO NOON MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 6 inches, with higher amounts possible in the mountains. * WHERE...Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains. * WHEN...From 2 AM to noon MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Warm roads may initially melt snow on contact, which may refreeze as snow continues to fall.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains
